title: PitchMe
description: Instantly generate quality referral pitches and cover letters using AI in only 3 steps! Edit with an in-built editor and login to save for future use.

title: Lawyours
description: A full-stack platform for clients and lawyers to post queries, discuss with and discover each other. Seek Counsel. Show Interest. Secure lives.

title: Musix
description: A full-fledged music streaming and exploration app, powered by Shazam Core API

title: Candid
description: A platform to post your candid thoughts and interact with others' candids.

title: Movierata
description: Web app that uses OMDB API to display movies and shows along with a lot of info like plot, ratings, awards, etc. Also lets the user search movies and shows and view anyone of them in detail.

title: Where in the world?
description: ReactJS app that uses REST Countries API to fetch and display details about countries. It also lets the user switch themes, search countries and filter them by region.

title: IP Address Tracker
description: ReactJS app to display various details about an entered IP address using IP Geolocation API alongwith its location on the map using LeafletJS. Initial render displays the user's IP address details.

title: Dino-ME
description: Simple fun app made with React, GPT-3 and React-Query, where you enter some of your qualities and get to know what dinosaur suits you, along with its images.

title: Kanye Quotz
description: ReactJS app that displays random Kanye West quotes using the Kanye REST API in a tweet layout that is downloadable as an image.

title: Header-Dhillon
description: NodeJS app that dynamically updates my twitter header with random lyrics from AP Dhillon's discography using API Dhillon, every 60 seconds.

title: Bonk-A-Dino!
description: A Jurassic spin on the classic whack-a-mole! Bonk a dino in two levels: Noob and Pro
